name: Vector_Tutorial_Vectorization_and_Data_Size
description:
This code demonstrates the effects of vectorization at different lengths by comparing unvectorized and vectorized loops operating on different data sizes. It is intended for use with the "Advantages of Vectorization & the Effects of Data Size" video walkthrough.

 https://software.intel.com/en-us/videos/advantages-of-vectorization-and-the-effects-of-data-size
author: Intel Corporation
